entry.title: Linux Guide
entry.summary: A wiki guide for simple linux tips Basic commands and syntax Basic file structure layout and how it applies Linux Command Cheat Sheet
entry.content:
A wiki guide for simple linux tips

Basic commands and syntax

  • cd
  • ls -l
  • cat
  • vi
  • mount
  • root

Basic file structure layout and how it applies 

  • etc
  • bin
  • usr
  • var
